A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I went to this movie wanting to see epic lightsaber battles\, closure for my old favorite characters and awesome effects.  While this movie had a few pretty solid scenes\, they made up only about 15% of the overall runtime.  The rest was useless filler with gaping plotholes.  *****SPOILERS BELOW I could sum this movie up in a few sentences that would sound like this: The first order was slowly chasing the resistance who were running low on fuel...Poe is kept in the dark about a secret mission  by a new person in charge...Leia should be dead but now all of a sudden uses the force to come (fly) back to life...Finn meets a new person who serves no real purpose and goes on a mission to find a code breaker to help the resistance and Rey recieves no training from a very crotchedy Luke.  That's about it.  And luke dies the dumbest death ever.  There are no cool new droids\, aliens\, villains or characters.  As a matter of fact Snoke and Phasma both die too.  So aside from the bad storytelling and lack of anything really interesting going on I would give this a big thumbs down.
